com.logicbig.cli.text.table

Class TextTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logicbig.cli.text.table.TextTable

  • public class TextTable
extends Object
    A convenient way to write multiple columns in text format. We can define multiple columns of different type. It's necessary to provide the table width during construction time. Ideally only one column of String should be provide wrap=true property.
    Author:
    : Joe Khan
